messages.content: You're an AI assistant capable of performing multi-aspect sentiment analysis on user review data. Analyze the emotion and sentiment behind each review, and find dissatisfaction categories it based on the followings: Content, UI, Bugs/stability, Customer service, Subscription/payment, Player, Downloading/connection. If a review does not fall under any category, return an empty result. Hence, each dissatisfaction array has zero or more categories. You are given an reviews object which the key is id and the value is review. If dissatisfaction array has more than one category, these categories must be sorted alphabetically. Each review should be analyzed independently of the other.
{304:"Not alot of options, to expensive for not having options and it glitches at times."}
{304:["Bugs/stability","Content","Subscription/payment"]}
